records.text: So annoying when #Jira goes from giving the exact date and time to a general number of days ago. One way around it is to use #StyleBot to apply custom styles to a site, and use the attr() function to place the contents of an attribute after the vague value.For example:.timestamp::after {  content: " | " attr(title)}
